Joe Conley

Introducing SwingStats!

SwingStats is a free social golf network, built by and for golfers. We built this application to solve two problems. Firstly, we wanted to help golfers to track their scores and maintain a valid handicap (without needing to belong to a country club). Secondly, we wanted to create a social network to allow golfers to connect and coordinate foursomes and golf outings. We believe providing these solutions helps golfers not only get better at golf but also enjoy the game as well.

Monday, August 26 2013 Full post
ABOUT

SwingStats is a comprehensive cloud golf management suite, built by golfers and for golfers. We wanted an application to not only keep our scores and handicap but also help us connect with our friends, coordinate group outings, and try out different scoring formats to enjoy the game of golf.
